title: Priyanka Chopra wears floral dress and carries dog Diana in New York
text:
Priyanka Chopra turned the sidewalk into a catwalk when she was pictured leaving the Four Seasons hotel in New York on Tuesday.

The 37-year-old had her pet dog, Diana out with her as she made her way to the Today show, where she was appearing as a guest.

She looked incredible, wearing a white midi dress by Markarian which was covered in pink flowers and had a sexy keyhole detail at the neckline.

Paw patrol: Priyanka Chopra looked incredible in a floral dress as she stepped out with her dog Diana in New York on Tuesday as she made her way to the Today show

Health hazard: However, she was left looking shocked when a falling 'no smoking' sign nearly fell on her

Paying close attention to detail, she wore a perfectly matched pair of pink suede backless heels which had a crystal strap going across the front.

Priyanka, who is married to Nick Jonas, 27, showed off her natural beauty as she styled her hair in an elegant chignon.

However, she looked shocked when a 'no smoking' sign nearly fell on her but she caught it in the nick of time.

Flower power: Priyanka looked incredible in her satin dress which she teamed with pink suede heels which had a crystal detail

Cute: Diana Chopra was rescued by Priyanka from the North Shore Animal League and even has her own Instagram account

According to Vogue, Diana Chopra was rescued by Priyanka from the North Shore Animal League and even has her own Instagram account.

Celebrity stylist Mimi Cuttrell even bought her a $2,070 Goyard tote to be carried in and Priyanka said: 'She refuses to leave it.'

Priyanka has been busy promoting her new movie, The Sky Is Pink, which marks marks her return to Bollywood after a three-year hiatus.

Busy lady: Priyanka has been busy promoting her new movie, The Sky Is Pink, which marks marks her return to Bollywood after a three-year hiatus

Exciting times: Although it is in Hindi, the movie has got a North America release on October 11

Although it is in Hindi, the movie has got a North America release on October 11.

She stars with Indian actor Farhan Akhtar in the story of a couple's relationship as narrated by their late daughter.

Speaking about the movie, Priyanka recently told the Times of India that it requires the audience to invest both their 'brain and heart'.

'This is a very special film based on a special real-life couple who thrive through extraordinary circumstances,' she said.

'I feel like in a cynical world today where we live our own lives, this film shows you what it can do when you have a family, family support.'

The actress married Jonas Brother Nick in December 2018 in a lavish extravaganza of a ceremony in Jodhpur, India.

Walking tall: The actress looked incredible as she made her way to her next destination

OOPS! Priyanka made quite the style statement as she headed out and still looked incredible when she caught the falling sign
